name: Project CLS Reboot (Test Build)
description:
Project CLS is an upcoming game set in the year 2257. You wake up aboard a doomed mining ship orbiting the planet Jupiter, and set out to survive against hostile alien invaders. Learning new abilities via a skill tree and acquiring an arsenal of weapons and armor, your prowess shapes the progress of the game based on what decisions you make with your newfound powers. Will you save the Rig, or will you become what you've sought to destroy?

This is an experimental build of the game and does NOT represent the final product by any means, shape or form. This version of the game is subject to change, and is up for playtesting and feedback.

There is a known issue where the menu does not show its options when the game is first launched. This will be fixed soon. In the mean time, you can use the arrow keys in the main menu to navigate and the issue fixes itself.
